name: Pidgey
overview: ExportPidgeyMove 1Brave BirdMove 2ReturnMove 3U-turnMove 4DefogHeat WaveItem Choice ScarfAbilityBig PecksNatureJollyNaiveEVs36 HP236 Atk228 SpePidgey's most viable set would be a Choice Scarf set to revenge kill weakened Fighting-types. However, its low Attack and average Speed prevent it from being threatening; Doduo, Vullaby, and Rufflet all perform this role more effectively.
